name: Push All Gems
description:
Push All Gems is a Sokoban clone game, in which the player pushes gems around in a warehouse, trying to get them to storage locations indicated with a landmark.

How to play:
Moves: arrows keys
Start game & next level: space

Credits:
Programming: JNSN (special thank to Michael Seyne for his tutorial)
Level design: Copyright (C) Jeng Long Jiang
Sprites, music & sounds: Sparklin Labs assets pack
Made with Superpowers Game Engine
